@graph.headline: JSON Prompts For Ecommerce Product Page Content
@graph.description: Advanced JSON prompting techniques for ecommerce product pages using OptizenAI, providing stricter guidelines and higher quality results with less hallucination compared to traditional text prompting.

hasDefinedTerm.name: JSON Prompting
hasDefinedTerm.description: A structured approach to AI prompting using JSON format that provides stricter guidelines and reduces hallucination compared to text prompting

hasDefinedTerm.name: Ecommerce SEO
hasDefinedTerm.description: Search engine optimization techniques specifically applied to ecommerce product pages including meta titles, descriptions, and content optimization

hasDefinedTerm.name: AI Content Generation
hasDefinedTerm.description: The process of using artificial intelligence and large language models to automatically create product descriptions, titles, and marketing content

hasDefinedTerm.name: Shopify Optimization
hasDefinedTerm.description: Techniques and tools for improving Shopify store performance, SEO, and product page effectiveness

hasDefinedTerm.name: OptizenAI
hasDefinedTerm.description: An AI-powered platform for ecommerce optimization that provides automated content generation and SEO tools for online stores

hasDefinedTerm.name: Large Language Model (LLM)
hasDefinedTerm.description: Advanced AI models capable of understanding and generating human-like text, used for content creation and optimization

@graph.name: JSON Prompts for Ecommerce Product Pages
@graph.description: Collection of four essential JSON prompts for optimizing ecommerce product page content

item.name: Simple JSON SEO Title Prompt
item.description: JSON prompt for paraphrasing SEO meta titles for Shopify products with character limits and formatting requirements

item.name: Simple JSON H1 Page Title Prompt
item.description: JSON prompt for paraphrasing H1 page titles with brand preservation and style inclusion requirements

item.name: Simple JSON SEO Description Prompt
item.description: JSON prompt for rewording SEO meta descriptions with call-to-action and character limit constraints

item.name: Simple JSON Product Description Prompt
item.description: Comprehensive JSON prompt for creating unique product descriptions with structured HTML output and internal linking

@graph.name: How to Use JSON SEO Title Prompt for Shopify Products
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide for implementing JSON SEO title prompts in OptizenAI

step.name: Navigate to Product Tab
step.text: Navigate to the 'product' tab in Optizen AI. Search via name or using tags for the product or products you wish to update. Use the check boxes to select the products.

step.name: Select JSON Prompt
step.text: Select the 'Simple JSON SEO Title Prompt' from the drop down under the SEO title prompt field. Ensure you are using the prompt repository tab. Be sure to check the box for 'Update this section'. Then click Proceed.

step.name: Execute and Review
step.text: Click Proceed to run the prompt. On completion, check the output using the Log section of the app. You can then choose to keep or restore the update.

step.name: Navigate to Product Tab
step.text: Navigate to the 'product' tab in Optizen AI. Search via name or using tags for the product or products you wish to update. Use the check boxes to select the products.

step.name: Select H1 JSON Prompt
step.text: Select the 'Simple JSON H1 Title Prompt' from the drop down under the H1 title prompt field. Ensure you are using the prompt repository tab. Be sure to check the box for 'Update this section'. Then click Proceed.

step.name: Execute and Review
step.text: Click Proceed to run the prompt. On completion, check the output using the Log section of the app.

@graph.name: How to Use JSON Product Description Prompt for Shopify Products
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide for implementing comprehensive JSON product description prompts in OptizenAI

step.name: Navigate to Product Tab

step.name: Execute and Review
